Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (15 ll.), verso pasted down: only upper part of the document is preserved. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Loan of corn, or some other crop, by Petearsemtheus son of Panobchuni to Harsiese son of Shebty [...] Date year 16 = 13 Mechir 8 of Queen Kleopatra and Ptol. Alexander = BC. 101 Feb 22". Concerning this group of texts, see entry for P BM EA 10491.
Curator's comments: Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. Text 22 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (C J Martin/S E Thomas).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (63) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/63)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss Black ink Backed: brown paper displayed in Room 63 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
